text: The Rochdale Observer is a tabloid newspaper published on Wednesdays and Saturdays for the Metropolitan Borough of Rochdale, in Greater Manchester, England. It has been Rochdale's main newspaper since 1856. It has also been a discussion point in BBC hit school based drama Waterloo Road. ==References== ==External links== * Rochdale Observer homepage Category:Publications established in 1856 Category:Newspapers published in Greater Manchester
title: Rochdale Observer
